name: Magic Fruit Legend Deluxe
description:
Magic Fruit Legend Deluxe is a very interesting and addictive match three casual game!
Match two or more fruits to crush them, and try to get as many score as possible!
Enjoy this legend game alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

How to play:
● Match three or more same identical splash fruits to score points.
● Eliminate the more cookie quickly can get extra scores.

Features:
● More than 300 challenging levels & many game props.
● Three game modes: Arcade, Mineral, Classic.
● Easy to learn but hard to game master.
● Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
● Bomb fruit can eliminate the cookies around.
